name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Field Engineer with a robust skill set in troubleshooting and root cause analysis, ensuring effective maintenance and repair of mechanical systems. Experienced in adhering to HSE standards and delivering exceptional customer service through clear technical reporting and communication. Proven ability to automate engineering processes and enhance systems reliability by leveraging a deep understanding of network configurations and engineering automation strategies. 

Additionally, I bring 13+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** across healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Strong background in aligning solutions with compliance standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS, while proficient in MLOps practices utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
